wiki.content: “NICE” is the fourth track on Jay-Z and Beyoncé’s debut collaboration album, EVERYTHING IS LOVE. American artist Pharrell Williams is featured on this album for the second time, with another appearance on the second track, “APESHIT.” This song features the thing Jay does best, aside from rapping: bragging. Hova has done such an unbelievable amount of songs about this topic that some think he’s run out of ideas. His verses on “I Got The Keys,” “BBC,” and “FuckWithMeYouKnowIGotIt” find him bragging about his success and skill. At least two songs on this album alone, “BOSS” and “HEARD ABOUT US,” also feature a lot of boasts about Jay’s success. Read more on Last.fm.
